attributes.action: Make dog fouling a criminal act.
attributes.additional_details: It's unsafe, unfair and goes against being civil which the act currently falls. Make it illegal to dog fouling.
attributes.background: Make dog owners responsible for cleaning up after their pet. 2 type of dog walkers. 1, A person who will allow their pet to piss or poo anywhere and leave it. 2, A person who will pick up the dog mess but will leave the bag filled with poo. Very little can be done under current laws

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about action against irresponsible dog owners, but it is already an offence not to clean up after a dog that has fouled, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
